Title: Evolving optical networks for latency-sensitive smart-grid communications via optical time slice switching (OTSS) technologies
Source: Opto-Electron. Commun. Conf., OECC Photonics Glob. Conf., PGC
Abstract: © 2017 IEEE.In this paper, we proposed a novel OTSS-assisted optical network architecture for smart-grid communication networks, which has unique requirements for low-latency connections. Illustrative results show that, OTSS can provide extremely better performance in latency and blocking probability than conventional flexi-grid optical networks.
